title: 12/18/20 HOUR 3- Bill Plaschke
itunes:title: 12/18/20 HOUR 3- Bill Plaschke
description:
Bill Plaschke tells Dan that he would side with Jerry West when it comes down to the Kawhi story. Plaschke says that the Chargers HC job is a plum job and he wouldn't mind seeing them hire Jim Harbaugh.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

content:encoded:
Bill Plaschke tells Dan that he would side with Jerry West when it comes down to the Kawhi story. Plaschke says that the Chargers HC job is a plum job and he wouldn't mind seeing them hire Jim Harbaugh.
